name: LanguageTips
0:
”Alexa, open Language Tips”
”Alexa, ask Language Tips for the latest update”
”Alexa, start Language Tips”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: language tips
des: Listen to the latest blogs posts from Dragoman Language Solutions. Our teachers, editors and translators regularly share their insights on writing, speaking, interpreting and translating. . You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. You can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next".
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
